item.title: Uneven road surface, 15th July
item.description:
Over the last couple of years our road surface is getting worse..... Many uneven cracks which over time will cause damage to our car tyres etc. The whole road could do with being resurfaced, however the worst parts are between numbers 30-50 I would say.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 40, Wyncham Avenue, Longlands, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This bin needs emptying far more often. It is only ever emptied after it is overflowing. It either needs to be emptied every few days, or at least one more bin provided nearby., 15th July
item.description:
You have received a request via Love Clean Streets to remedy an issue within your Service Area Litter Bins – Overflowing Lat/Long - 51.4245447321256, -0.0320429687662384 what3words - during.libraries.noses Nearest address - 1 Station Approach, Lower Sydenham, London, SE26 5FD

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Station Approach, New Beckenham, London

item.title: Grass needs cutting on Doddington Green, 15th July
item.description:
It hasn't been cut in months and leaving Rye grass with its tough Rye seeds doesn't particularly help biodiversity, I believe. Doddington Green is on Cook's Road/Doddington Place/ Harmsworth Street/Doddington Grove, outside Kean House.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Doddington Place, Kennington, London

item.title: Depression/collapse in pavement and roadway under lamppost, 15th July
item.description:
There is a noticeable and worsening depression in the pavement and road on the front side of 109 Shenley Road. There is a noticeable slant to the pavement adjacent to the lamp post marked by the pin, continuing into the front garden of 109 Shenley road. it can be most clearly seen from the road, the paving slabs are noticeably less prominent from the asphalt surface of the road for strip approximately 2 meters wide.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 109, Shenley Road, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
